name: Total Tele Terror - [TTT]
description:
Mother's Day.

Breakfast in bed, flowers on the table, rejoicing with Mom!

A few years later: a box of chocolates, a dear letter and of course the obligatory phone call!

For some, the best day of the year.

But what if this very special day turns into hell on earth?!

Maximum callers, maximum responsibility, maximum expectation, maximum (network) load.

And thousands of mothers whose hearts could be broken.

Welcome to the telecommunications center DANN & WANN GmbH & Co. KG!

Here you are allowed to monitor an ailing network structure in sole responsibility in order to avoid the emotional super-disaster.

Click, push, phone, switch, beep, buup, boop !

There are no limits to your micromanagement fantasy!

Then let's see what you've learned in your second-rate IT training!

And don't forget: No Sweat, No Tears, Just smiles!

TEAM
